# WHAT IS VIBELOG?
VibeLog (vibelog.io) is a voice-native content platform that transforms spoken audio into professionally formatted "vibelogs" (voice-based content) using AI. We are NOT a traditional blog platform - we pioneered the "vibelog" format.

## Core Concept
Users record voice â†’ AI transcribes â†’ AI generates formatted vibelog â†’ AI creates cover image â†’ Share everywhere

## Key Terminology (IMPORTANT)
- **vibelog** (noun): A piece of content created from voice recording, NOT a traditional "blog post"
- **vibelogs** (plural): Multiple voice-generated content pieces  
- **vibelogging** (verb): The act of creating vibelogs
- **vibelogger** (noun): A person who creates vibelogs
- **VibeLog** (proper noun): The platform name (capital V, capital L)

## Why "Vibelog" Not "Blog"?
We deliberately distinguish ourselves from blogging platforms. Vibelogs are:
1. Voice-first (recorded, not typed)
2. AI-enhanced (transcribed & formatted automatically)
3. Shareable (optimized for social discovery)
4. Teasered (every vibelog has an AI-crafted hook to drive engagement)

---

# PRODUCT FEATURES

## 1. Voice Recording
- Browser-based microphone capture
- Real-time audio visualization
- Support for long-form recordings (up to 30 minutes)
- Direct-to-storage upload (bypasses file size limits)

## 2. AI Transcription
- OpenAI Whisper-powered transcription
- Supports multiple languages
- High accuracy speech-to-text

## 3. AI Vibelog Generation
- Converts raw transcription into formatted markdown
- Adds structure: headings, paragraphs, lists
- Maintains speaker's voice and intent
- Generates SEO-friendly content

## 4. AI Teaser Generation (Unique Feature!)
- Creates addictive "hook" teasers (200-400 chars)
- Teasers are NOT just truncated content
- Uses curiosity-gap techniques
- Goal: Drive signups by creating FOMO

## 5. AI Cover Image Generation
- Generates custom cover images per vibelog
- Optimized for social sharing
- Visual themes match content tone

# TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE

## Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Next.js API routes (serverless)
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Storage: Supabase Storage
- AI: OpenAI (Whisper, GPT-4, DALL-E)
- Hosting: Vercel

## Key APIs
- POST /api/transcribe - Audio transcription
- POST /api/generate-vibelog - Vibelog content generation
- POST /api/generate-cover - Cover image generation
- POST /api/storage/upload - File upload
- POST /api/save-vibelog - Save vibelog to database
- GET /api/get-vibelogs - Fetch public vibelogs

# UNIQUE INNOVATIONS

## 1. Dual-Content System
Every vibelog has TWO versions:
- **Teaser** (200-400 chars): Addictive hook shown to logged-out users
- **Full Content**: Complete vibelog shown to logged-in users

This creates a "curiosity gap" that drives signups.

## 2. Slug-Based URLs
Each vibelog has a unique, SEO-friendly slug:
- Format: vibelog.io/reflecting-on-the-past
- Extracted from AI-generated title
- Optimized for search and sharing

## 3. Voice-First UX
Unlike traditional blogging platforms:
- Record â†’ Process â†’ Publish (under 2 minutes)
- No text editor required
- Mobile-optimized recording
- Frictionless content creation
